data.eml:eml: Two new species of Cheiroseius Berlese (Acari: Blattisociidae), with a key for identification of the species from Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article De Moraes, Gilberto J. (2017): Two new species of Cheiroseius Berlese (Acari: Blattisociidae), with a key for identification of the species from Brazil. Zootaxa 4324 (1): 108-120, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4324.1.6
